testcase.classname: US1002 kullanici jPH endpoint'ine post request gÃ¶nderir
testcase.system-out: Given Kullanici "jPHBaseUrl" base URL'ini kullanir..........................passed Then Path parametreleri icin "posts/70" kullanir............................passed And POST request icin "Ahmet","Merhaba",10 70 bilgileri ile request body olusturur.passed And jPH server a POST request gonderir ve testleri yapmak icin response degerini kaydeder.passed Then jPH respons'da status degerinin 200....................................passed And jPH respons'da content type degerinin "application/json; charset=utf-8".passed And jPH respons daki "Connection" header degerinin "keep-alive".............passed Then response attribute degerlerinin "Ahmet","Merhaba",10 70................passed
